subtitle: how to stay calm when it seems like the
world is
imploding when you see some of the
images how can you be
calm was a beautiful expression that
really helps in times like this when
you're bound above you don't fall
below this is the time where we need to
dig deeper connect to our True Values
Eternal
values specifically find things that you
really believe in share them with your
family share them with your friends this
is like the rope that we hold on to that
allows us to navigate the storms around
us if you don't have that then you
become vulnerable to the vicissitudes
and the ups and downs especially when
you follow the media so this is the best
and most important time is to connect to
the most important values that you stand
for kindness love compassion
virtue the desire for peace Unity
